<title level="1" right="Rules">[Other Worn Items](/Rules.aspx?ID=772)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 604 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
These are a wide variety of items you wear. Armor appears in its own section on page 555, and apex items that can increase ability scores are on page 603.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Other Worn Items
